oai_dc:dc.dc:title: List of votes poled for military officers in the 14th Civil District
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is the tally of votes for military officers in the 14th Civil District date June 8, 1861 which coincides with the date of Tennessee's referendum on secession. The 14th Civil District was in the northeast section of Lawrence County, Tennessee. On the reverse side is the certification of the judges and clerks testifying that the results are a true copy of the votes cast on the secession referendum.
